name: Jikuu Sousakan Pretty Angel: Misty Flash
overview: In the future, humans have invented the time machine. However, criminals soon found a way to manipulate it and hide from the authorities by traveling to the past. As a result, human history began changing itself. In order to put an end to this, a special group called Misty Flash was assembled. Consisting of three young and attractive women - Mai, Yuri, and Miki - the group travels to different time periods, locates criminals, but also liberally enjoys the pleasures of flesh. Misty Flash is a hybrid of Japanese-style adventure and card-based battles. Short adventure segments feature traditional menu-based interface; typically, the player has to exhaust all options before the next event is triggered. Confrontations against female criminals take the shape of turn-based battles. The player is dealt a deck of cards representing normal attacks, special attacks, healing, as well as buffing up attack power and defense. In addition, each card has a number from 1 to 9; the higher this number is, the stronger is the effect of the card. Battles end with interactive, menu-based lesbian sex scenes.
